quote_first: Danny walked quickly back past the hotel, checking every intersection until he finally saw the name Argyll Street carved in large letters on a stone slab above him. He checked his watch as he turned into the street:
title: A Prisoner of Birth
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last: Martha had put a saucepan of milk to heat slowly at the side of the stove. This was done most nights at Martingale so that she could get early to bed.
title: Cover Her Face
author: P.D. James
